summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.0°C) and outside temperature (down 2.4°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 5%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 5536 lux) and cloud levels (up 456 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1389 m), light levels (up 7803 lux), feels like temperature (up 3.9°C), and outside temperature (up 3.2°C) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 455.8m lower than yesterday, 1014.5m lower than past week, 1389.3m lower than past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 860m and a high of 3110m, averaging 1417.5m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Chance of light rain, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
